answers.answer: Hello!You should wear proper footwear, take multivitamins and also diagnose other reasons for numbness like diabetes, hypertension and peripheral vascular disorders. I would suggest you to do ankle exercises regularly. You can repeat plantar flexion and dorsiflexion along with sidewise movements at your ankle joint regularly.Take care!

question: what is good treatment to revive numbness in feet?
title: neuropathy of feet
